hero.heading: Enforce policy as code for HashiCorp products

overview.heading: What is Sentinel?
overview.body: Sentinel is a policy as code tool that lets you control what users of HashiCorp tools are allowed to do. It enforces policies proactively, preventing end users from deploying changes that aren't allowed.

get_started.heading: Getting Started
get_started.body: Use Sentinel to enforce policies for HashiCorp products.
